name: OrderedProperties_putAllTest
description: Unit tests for the putAll method of the OrderedProperties class.

test_cases.name: testPutAll
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method by adding multiple key-value pairs to the OrderedProperties instance and verifying the size and content.

test_cases.name: testPutAllEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with an empty map, verifying that the size of the OrderedProperties instance remains zero.

test_cases.name: testPutAllWithExistingKeys
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with a map containing keys that already exist in the OrderedProperties instance, verifying that the values are updated and new keys are added.
